# result(from:)

**Instance Method**

Performs an asynchronous match with a signature you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
func result(from signature: SHSignature) async -> SHSession.Result
```

## Parameters

- **signature**: The signature to match.

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHSession/Result] enum that indicates the result.

## Returning queries

- **SHSession.Result**: Identifies the result from an asynchronous sequence result.
